website_summaries.verdict: Expensive, but the quality isn't better than cheaper bath soaks.
pros: Unique fragrances and herbs such as geranium and sweet orange
Large bottle for multiple uses across the month
cons: It doesn't provide different results than more affordable choices

customer_reviews.title: Epsom Bath Enhancer
customer_reviews.text: Adding a small amount to unscented epsom salts adds a relaxing fragrance without too much of the oily sensation others have complained about. A couple of capfuls do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: jimstake

customer_reviews.title: Smells Good Great for Hot Bath Soak
customer_reviews.text: Have tried a lot of the EO products like the smell of this one nice to soak in this epsom product.
customer_reviews.author: BOATS99

customer_reviews.title: So very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Smells old and funky :( Super disappointed. Not eligible for returns so will dump it. I have used and enjoyed this product enough times to know this was an old and came unsealed.
customer_reviews.author: Ian M

customer_reviews.title: smells and feels wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell of geranium. I like this brand a lot. It is a high quality and well priced!
customer_reviews.author: nsb

customer_reviews.title: My favorite essential oil epsom salt
customer_reviews.text: My favorite essential oil epsom salt. I only use half of what they recommend to put in water and add additional regular epsom salt. Love, love all their scents and products!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this bath soak. It spathes my tight muscles and smells so fresh. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothea

customer_reviews.title: Smells and feels great!
customer_reviews.text: Smells and feels great! THis particular one is a nice citrus even for the winter. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells Great!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for my sister and she loves it! Smells great!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Doctor recommended sitz baths
customer_reviews.text: Doctor recommended sitz baths. Husband bought the Sinner Soak of this series. They are WONDERFUL! Full of wonderful essential oils, not only does it smell good but fees good too. Will leave you a little greasy because of the oils. But this makes for a wonderful soak in the tub! Would buy again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: C - Mama Likes To Read Book Blog

customer_reviews.title: Smell at your own risk...
customer_reviews.text: I really like the product itself, my skin felt very moisturized from the oil and it was a nice relaxing soak. This scent is definitely more geranium than anything (I personally smelled no sweet orange flavor) so if you're not into soaking in geranium (which I wasn't) then I would recommend trying a different scent.
customer_reviews.author: cableknit

customer_reviews.title: but the salts last much longer and don't dry out my skin like the bath mix
customer_reviews.text: I have used this scent as a bubble bath before, but the salts last much longer and don't dry out my skin like the bath mix. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: SD

customer_reviews.title: Dont pass this up
customer_reviews.text: Best epsom salt ever, smell is amazing and leaves your skin silky smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the scent and the oils moisturize your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful at releiving sore muscles and as a bonus softens skin and hair!
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used this epsom soak I was surprised as to how much it helped to relieve muscle, knee and back pain and so wonderful how it softens my skin. I now use this product in my bath every time I wash my hair for the slip properties of lessening snarls. This geranium , scented by essential oils, is soothing for moon issues and nerves.
customer_reviews.author: Ginni Carrigan

customer_reviews.title: And my muscles sighed!
customer_reviews.text: The Yoga is the best in the series in my opinion. I feel completely uplifted and yet relaxed after this wonderful soak. I have turned at least 5 other people onto this stuff. I am convinced it is the Boswelia oil that really makes this stuff so effective on fatigued muscles. And aroma isn't over powering, but beautifully envelopes the senses in warm citrus tones. I normally wouldn't pay $13 on bath salts, but I feel this product is worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: Mixtress

customer_reviews.title: Terrible! Don't buy this!
customer_reviews.text: Yuck! Super oily and sticky! It also left a blue ring around my bathtub, even though it's not colored which was really weird. Probably the worst bath soak I've ever purchased
customer_reviews.author: Shae Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this stuff. Smells amazing and feels so good.
customer_reviews.author: morekatie
